page.title: 16RELIGION
page.content: Not many people go to church these days because they're not sure about God and they are too busy. But some people do believe in God.Some people go to the Church of England,some people go to the Baptist church, and some people go to the Methodist church.There are 3 Church of England churches in our area. One is at Hawkmoor hospital ( St Mary's was built by the patient's for Â£2,000) One is in Bovey Tracey called St Peter, St Paul and St Thomas a Becket,the other St,Marys,is in Hennock.Only 5 out of 31 children in our class go to church and that is the church of England.Two children are Jehovahs Witnesses and they meet in Newton Abbot.
